transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Sir, is it Ibrahim sir from Falak Enterprises, sir?
Customer: Yes, sir.
Executive: Ibrahim ji, Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke top office Noida se, senior manager. Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Bas, theek hoon sir.
Executive: Sir, do minute baat ho payegi aapse agar aap allow karte?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, aapki na baat hui thi meri team mein abhi ek do din pehle jo Manisha hai jo aapka account dekhte hain. To aapne kahin na kahin matlab kuch problem share kara. Matlab satisfied nahi the aap unke given solution se.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Feedback aapne not satisfied ka diya tha WhatsApp ke through. Thoda mujhe batayenge sir kya problem aa rahi hai? Kaise hum help kar sakte hain sir taki aap bhi grow karein, aapka business bhi grow karein. Thoda aap bata de sir.
Customer: Sir, jaise lead aati hai na koi.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aapko pata hai market place mein vagerah jaise ye Facebook wale jo social media wale jo aate hain jaise connect hota hai. Is this available? Koi aisa koi word hota hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Contact karta hai customer. Wo direct mere WhatsApp pe aana chahiye. Mere WhatsApp pe contact ho nahi pata hai. Main aise dekhunga karunga mere paas itna time nahi hai sir.
Customer: Direct WhatsApp pe connect ho jaaye. Usko main detail bhej doon. Usko main kar doon. Ji. Hai na? Aur ya mere paas call bhi nahi aati hai na koi detail aati hai. Sir main ismein package leke main nuksan mein hoon. Koi matlab nahi hai sir is package ka.
Customer: Main ye keh raha hoon. Aur dusri baat jab tak Manisha ka koi galti nahi hai jo upar ke senior manager jisne package diya tha wo mere se baat nahi karta na phone uthata mera.
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sir dekhiye kya hota hai na jisne aapko package sell kar hote hain wo new sales division se hote hain to wo aapka account handle nahi karte hain. Sir dekhiye main aapko ye nahi keh raha sir aap IndiaMART ko 24 ghante open karke rakhiye. Aapka sir jo product hai na main iski aapko 100% guarantee de sakta hoon. Easily aapko sir calls aur usse hi achha khasa business ho jayega. But sir agar aap open nahi karenge. Dekhiye sir WhatsApp bhi aapko open karna padta hai ek bari ko dekhne ke liye.
Customer: WhatsApp to main kar lunga sir. WhatsApp to karta hoon. Sir main kya keh raha hoon. Ek minute meri baat sun lijiye sir. IndiaMART mein maine payment show kiya hai aur maine ₹40,000 mein mera abhi tak ye single koi aisa maza nahi hai. Theek hai? Dusri baat maine jo free ka jo chalta hai na market place vagerah aas paas ki lead aas paas ke gaon ki jaise aas paas ke kshetra ki 120 kilometer ke area ki. To waha automatic hai na connect ho jati thi aur main ja ja ke dekh aaya hoon waha pe maan liye. Theek hai na? Aur jabki IndiaMART to ek bahut badi company hai fir bhi usmein agar lead nahi aayegi to fir kya ummid karein sir?
Executive: Sir lead aayegi. Main us cheez ke liye aapko bolne sir main aapko na number bhi dikha sakta hoon. Dekhiye aapko India mein product dete hain ya fir aap
Customer: Nahi main all India mein deta hoon lekin main interesting nahi hoon us lead se. Kyunki itna door kaun jayega karega. All India ka dila do lekin kshetra ki hai na aas paas ke kshetra ki jyada aani chahiye mere paas lead.
Executive: Aapko kahan kahan chahiye jyada? Aapko kahan ki jyada chahiye aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Aas paas ke kshetra ki chahiye aas paas ke kshetra ki. Meri location hai na Makrana 331505.
Executive: Haan Makrana ho gaya Makrana mein Rajasthan state to pura kar do. Makrana pura hai na sir aap? Makrana haan Rajasthan pura kar do koi dikkat nahi hai lekin jaise Kuchaman, Parbatsar, Degana, Didwana aas paas ka jo kshetra hai na.
Executive: Bas ye kshetra ki ho jayegi.
Executive: Ek bar ek bar sir aisa ho.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Main samajh gaya aapki baat. Aisa ho sakta hai sir ek bar ek bar aap video meet pe aa paye 5-10 minute ke liye jab aap free ho?
Customer: Haan bataiye.
Executive: Actually kya hai na main main aapko do teen abhi hai aap system ke samne available?
Customer: System abhi nahi hai mere paas. System abhi leya hua hai kisi paas bhai ke paas.
Executive: Kitni der mein aapke paas system aa jayega? Kitni der mein system aayega aapke paas?
Executive: Kab tak aayega aapke paas?
Executive: Matlab kab aap honge computer ke samne?
Customer: Computer ke samne to sir main sham tak hi ho sakta hoon. Abhi to nahi hai mere paas computer.
Executive: Sir dekhiye main na do cheeze aapko batata hoon. Aapko 100% calls hi achhi khasi aa jayengi apne nearby location se aur abhi to sir aapke
Customer: Like number show hote hain. Like customer ke number show hote hain. Customer ke number show ho to wapas jaise koi chhut jaaye call to usko main wapas call kar sakta hoon. Aisa kuch hona chahiye option. Ab direct koi lead aaye.
Executive: Sir main wahi bata raha hoon sir main
Executive: Main wahi option aapko bata raha hoon jaise aap WhatsApp open karte hain na sir aise IndiaMART ka lead manager hota hai. Aap waha pe jaake call bhi wahin se mila sakte hain. Sab kuch aapko kahin aur nahi jana padega. Waha pe call ka icon hota hai call mila dijiye. Jisko message karna hai aap jaise message karenge buyer ko direct wo message chala jayega. IndiaMART ke buyer ko jo aap message IndiaMART
Customer: Sir lead manager aap din mein saat aath bar bhi kholenge matlab ek ghante mein ek bar bhi kholenge aur main kuch buy lead aapko bataunga din ki do teen kariye dekhiye aapka phone call isse hi itna business karwa dunga sir main. Par sir dekhiye thoda bahut time to dena padega na sir dekhiye WhatsApp kya hai na sir hum hame koi problem nahi hai aapko WhatsApp pe bhejane se par WhatsApp ke aapko pata hai sir kuch rules regulation hote hain. To WhatsApp aur IndiaMART ka connect ho nahi pa raha hai us vajah se ki hum direct aapko lead bhej paye. Usmein aapko pata hai business WhatsApp lena padta hai usmein verification hota hai aur agar kisi ne spam mark kar diya to WhatsApp band ho jata hai. To is vajah se na sir main aapko business WhatsApp mera business WhatsApp hi hai.
Executive: Sir business WhatsApp hai aapka par main keh raha hoon IndiaMART ke liye aap IndiaMART ek app alag rakhiye WhatsApp alag rakhiye. IndiaMART pe jo reply karega hum aapko message karenge ki samne wale ka reply aaya hai aapko. Aapko ek ek cheez ka notification aayega sir hamari app ke through ki dekho iska reply aaya hai fir aap usko jawab wapas dijiye. Jisko call milana hai usko waha se call mila dijiye. Aap din mein sir char panch bar to open kar sakte hain na main nahi keh raha pura din aap open karke baithiye aadha hi ghanta to dijiye sir pure din mein 15-15 minute ke char slot bana lijiye ya 10-10 minute ke che slot bana lijiye. Main aapko video call pe char cheeze bataunga sir. Aap kitne baje honge system ke samne?
Customer: Sir sham ko hounga aap system ke samne. Sham ko 5:00 baje?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Main 5:00 baje aapko call karunga mera phone rahiye 15 minute mein char cheeze bataunga aap hafta karke dekhiyega aap khud bataiyega aapko fayda hota nahi hota. 100% hoga Ibrahim sir. Is baat ki guarantee de raha hoon main aapko. Aur aapka product to sir is time pe high selling hai hotels mein restaurants mein har jagah assemble hi lag raha hai koi bhi branded le hi nahi raha hai TV and all. Haan. To achha khasa product hai sir ye aap fikar mat kariye main abhi WhatsApp mein aapko hi likh ke bhi bhej raha hoon mera number save kariye Pravesh ke naam se. Aap jaise hi system ke samne mujhe bhejiye ga aur agle ek mahine ke andar dekhiyega aapka lead number calls ke through direct aapke calls pe bhi calls aayengi. Par aapko active hona hai aur kaise hona hai wo main aapko bataunga kitna active hona hai. Ek ghanta mere liye bahut hai aap pura IndiaMART ko denge pure din mein. Theek hai sir?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main 5:00 baje call karunga sir 5:00 baje aap free rahiyega please phone uthaiyega. Main WhatsApp pe to hoon lekin mere paas system nahi hai na system abhi nahi hai mere paas.
Executive: Mobile to hai mobile hai aapke paas?
Customer: Haan mobile mein abhi dekh lo abhi bata deta hoon bata do.
Executive: Main mobile pe bhi aapko link bhej raha hoon. Ek second rukiye.
Executive: Sir abhi main aapko link bhej raha hoon aapki email id jo hai na sir uske upar ek link aayega mobile se join kar lijiye. Theek hai sir? Main WhatsApp mein aapko link bhi share kar raha hoon aap WhatsApp pe dekhiye abhi 5 minute mein link aa raha hai aapke paas. Theek hai sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants direct WhatsApp connection for leads.

- No calls or details received after subscription.

- Dissatisfied with current package performance.



Resolution:

- Explained account handling by new sales division.

- Guaranteed business growth with active IndiaMART use.

- Offered video call to explain lead management.

- Will share link on WhatsApp to join video call.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to call customer at 5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, whatsapp, video call
